title: Ive been kidnapped and sent to a conversion camp
body:
Before I start this I should explain: I am a very very blatantly gay woman. I’ve been dating the same girl for about 2 years. We were happy and healthy...

About a week ago, my girlfriend and I were headed to our local Walmart. We both work at a restaurant, so naturally it was kind of a late Walmart run.

Now we all know and love Walmart, and sometimes the things we see in Walmart are worth enough to be on r/nosleep by themselves.

As we were making our way through the isles, we noticed another gay couple. 2 women, just like us.

No big deal, it’s always nice to see people in our community as in love as we are. They noticed us and we waved.

They both stared at us with wide eyes and an empty expression. We brushed it off as us interrupting an argument.

We continued our shopping as normal. Finishing up about 20 minutes later, we head to the check out. We went through self check out and 2 people behind us was the couple. They weren’t talking, and they had 1 thing in their basket. They didn’t even look at each other.

One girl was looking around and the other was just staring.. directly at me. She didn’t even look at my girlfriend or anything else. Every time I turned around I could feel her eyes on me.

After we checked out and left I booked it out to our car and we back out of the store. After we were on our way, my girlfriend asked why I was so shaken up. I told her about the couple and she told me not to worry about it and made some cheesy joke about how they though I was cute. We went home, no problem.

In the middle of the night I heard our dog bark. She doesn’t usually bark unless someone’s in the house or someone’s moving around. I kind of freaked out and i shot up right to find my girlfriend not next to me.

I heard the sink running, so I assumed she was in the bathroom. I laid back down and that’s when I saw her tied up in the closet.

Instantly I sat up and I went to get up and i felt something hit my head and everything went black.

I woke up again when the trunk door opened and I was thrown out of the trunk by the ropes that were tying me up. My girlfriend was unconscious, but alive next to me.

I got told to get up and start walking. That was the last time I’ve seen her.

I walked into a huge building and the first thing they did was stuck a syringe in me and take blood.

Then they put me in a basic gray sweat suit and gave me 3 shirts to change into. Next, they took me to my cage where they branded me with my number: 56221.

As I was being forced into my cell, I saw the girl I saw at Walmart leaving. They were congratulating her on finding someone else to rehabilitate and wished her a peaceful life.

Everyday, they pull me into room where they show me videos of my girlfriend and I and put me through torture or cause me to get sick. I’ve been tased, poisoned, electrocuted, and one day when I didn’t respond the way they wanted; they cut off my finger.

I’ve been told countless times that I’m going to die here. I’ve been told I’m never going to be cured. I’ve been told this is my resting place. I belong here.

I only get fed once a day because I’m “failing rehab.”

I don’t know what’s happened to my girlfriend.

I’m only posting this because instead of taking my sleeping pills I hid them under my tongue and I put them in the guards drink when he tried to come into my cell. I took his phone and he’s knocked out on the floor.

I don’t know what to do. I’m scared, and I need help. Please. Help me.
author: Supersydney0829
